description: This file defines a PricingService class that simulates fetching the latest product prices, and a utility function to evaluate and create price alerts based on historical data. It interacts with SQLAlchemy models and database sessions.

classes.name: PricingService
classes.description: A stub service class that simulates fetching the latest price for a product.

methods.name: Optional[float] fetch_latest_price(self, product: models.Product)
methods.description: Fetches a pseudo-determined latest price for a given product, simulating external fetching logic.

methods.name: Optional[models.Alert] maybe_create_alert(db: Session, product: models.Product, new_price: float)

ctags.name: maybe_create_alert
ctags.pattern: /^def maybe_create_alert(db: Session, product: models.Product, new_price: float) -> Optional[model/
